column5: MSc Environmental Engineering is closely aligned with industry’s demands, this course meets the needs of:urban regenerationland contamination managementenvironmental protectioninfrastructure investment portfolios in Scotland and worldwideA distinctive feature of this course is its topical nature. Glasgow has been undergoing extensive urban regeneration, including building on land that's been contaminated in the past. You’ll have challenging 'real world' issues to study close to the University. From this experience, you'll become able to translate the principles of environmental engineering that you have learned into national and international context.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 12 months full-time; 24 or 36 months part-time 36 months distance learning
